sentences.en: A few horse-drawn carts still trundle through the dilapidated mining villages.
sentences.cn: 几架马车仍然在破落的矿村中曲折行进。

sentences.en: After entering the system trundle strip , as soon as the blue screen dodges, restarts.
sentences.cn: 进入系统滚动条后蓝屏一闪, 重启.

sentences.en: Girls trundle in carrying heavy book bags.
sentences.cn: 背着沉重书包的女孩们慢慢走进来。

sentences.en: I am coming !'he shouted, and sailed the trundle - bed boat straight at them.
sentences.cn: 他叫道, 乘着矮床帆船径直向星星们驶去.

sentences.en: I doubt if Emerson could trundle a wheelbarrow through the streets ( Henry David Thoreau )
sentences.cn: 我怀疑爱默生是否能把一辆独轮车推过街道 ( 亨利戴维索罗 )

sentences.en: The old man lifted the wheelbarrow and trundled it away.
sentences.cn: 老人抬起手推车，慢慢地推走了。

trans.tran_en: If you trundle something somewhere, especially a small, heavy object with wheels, you move or roll it along slowly

trans.tran_cn: 使滚动，运送，旋转，用矮轮推动
